section.section: Before or after the filing of a complaint, the alleged father may propose a settlement concerning the child's support whether the alleged father admits or denies paternity.
The proposed contribution may be in a lump sum, installments, or otherwise.

text.section: If the court approves the settlement agreement, the terms of the agreement shall be incorporated in a court order.
A court order incorporating a settlement agreement is as enforceable as any order that is passed after a hearing.
